item.title: Mount Google-Drive in Ubuntu
item.description: In this post, I’ll be describing how to setup automatic mounting of one or more Google Drives locally, on your Ubuntu system. Following steps should generally work for the supported Ubuntu versions of the google-drive-ocamlfuse tool. Let’s just right into the setup steps. Assumptions Here are the list of assumptions made for descriptive purposes. Please replace them with appropriate values based on your system and environment. Normal user: ubuntu Base path for GDrive mount folders: $HOME/Store (Ex.
